l1kfpwuGklkXVKel.hint: Your size is Medium. Dwarves vary little in height or size, with most standing between 4 and 5 feet tall. Even the smallest dwarves possess broad frames and rarely weigh less than 150 pounds.

description.value:
Your dwarf character has the following hereditary traits.

Age. Dwarves are physically mature around age 20, but most consider themselves young until they reach age 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
